democrat*.
BEAU; Was he?
TOCs I donBt know® In years to come they may be toasting us©
BEAUs Wells X am going in now® Tomorrow we leave for the frontier,
eh? The truly wild America; remote; savage; unsettled©
The Great Lakes themselves® I need sleep to face ito
TOCs I shall be along soon© I am still trying to compose my
thoughts after the stimulation they have received from the
sacred day of the nation of equality© What are we to make
of it all?

TOCs The nations of our time cannot prevent the conditions of
men from becoming equal, but it depends upon themselves
whether the principle of ©quality is to lead them to
servitude or freedom, to knowledge or barbarism, to prosperity
